title: Sproutworks - Super Brand Mall
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Multiple outlets offering a salad bar, plus soup and sandwiches. This one opened Jan 2013 at Xinle Rd and then moved here. Uses ingredients like quinoa, bulgur, and kale with tofu as an add-on possibility. Items are labeled if vegetarian, vegan, contain nuts, etc., and staff can tell you what's gluten-free. Beverages include juices, flavored iced teas, and lemonades. Uses eco-friendly plates and cutlery.
streetAddress: Super Brand Mall B2, 168 Lujiazui Rd, Pudong
